products.title: Barcelona Tee, Black
products.description: Black FC Barcelona t-shirt featuring the club's iconic crest. Stylish and comfortable, perfect for everyday wear or match days.

products.title: Barcelona Tee, White
products.description: Clean and fresh white tee with subtle Barça colors. Lightweight and breathable — ideal for casual fans and summer days.

products.title: Barcelona Hoodie, Black
products.description: Cozy black hoodie with bold FC Barcelona branding. Stay warm while repping your favorite team in streetwear fashion.

products.title: Barcelona Hoodie, Red
products.description: Soft white hoodie featuring sleek Barça visuals. A modern and stylish way to support your club on chilly days.

products.title: Barcelona Cushion
products.description: FC Barcelona-themed cushion for your couch or bed. Adds a sporty and colorful touch to your home decor.

products.title: Barcelona Tote Bag
products.description: Durable tote bag with Barça graphics. Great for groceries, gym gear, or showing your loyalty on the go.

products.title: Barcelona Cup
products.description: Classic ceramic cup with FC Barcelona logo. Start your mornings with coffee and club pride.

products.title: Barcelona Figure
products.description: Collector's figure of FC Barcelona mascot. A perfect gift or decorative item for passionate fans.
